value.string:
assert(context.getPortalType() == 'Sale Order Line')
 assert(context.getSimulationState() == 'confirmed')
 packing_list = context.getParentValue().getCausalityRelatedValue(portal_type='Sale Packing List')
 assert(packing_list is not None)
 packing_list_line_list = packing_list.getMovementList()
 assert(len(packing_list_line_list) == 1)
 packing_list_line = packing_list_line_list[0]
 simulation_movement = context.getDeliveryRelatedValue(portal_type='Simulation Movement')
 assert(simulation_movement is not None)
 applied_rule_list = simulation_movement.searchFolder(portal_type='Applied Rule')
 assert(len(applied_rule_list)) == 1
 applied_rule = applied_rule_list[0]
 assert(applied_rule.getSpecialiseValue().getReference() == 'default_delivering_rule')
 delivery_simulation_list = applied_rule.searchFolder()
 assert(len(delivery_simulation_list) == 1)
 delivery_simulation = delivery_simulation_list[0]
 packing_list_line = packing_list_line.getRelativeUrl()
 if delivery_simulation.getDelivery() == packing_list_line:
 # already setup, nothing to do
 return
 assert(delivery_simulation.getDelivery() is None)
 delivery_simulation.setDelivery(packing_list_line)
